title: Gusto Engineering's Diversity Update: It's Not Just About the Numbers

title: i
description:
Roses are red
Violets are blue
I was looping forever
And then I found you.

i was your name
I think j was next to you
Born inside a for
Died in there too.

I saw you getting bigger
Loop over loop over loop
And j was getting smaller
You were a great group.

And then you just vanished
You left me there alone
Condition wasn't true
At least nothing was thrown.

title: Mongoid - Inheritance: change embedded document's type via nested attributes
description:
I recently faced some issues when trying to update a nested document’s type via nested attributes using the mongoid gem. Bare with me if this sentence doesn’t make any sense yet.

Use case

Suppose we have a document named Person that embeds a document that can be any of the types Book or BoardGame which inherit from the class Item.
